feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission demonstrates a functioning financial application: it ingests stock tickers, compiles data/news/metrics, and produces buy/hold recommendations with confidence — meeting the criterion that the tool performs financial tasks. Implementation and reflection remarks confirm the app is built and actively working (with occasional tweaks), so PASS is warranted.
- Integrate AI: The submission demonstrates substantive AI integration: the app uses Google AI Studio to generate buy/sell recommendations, confidence scores, and AI-generated theses/summaries that inform users. The student produced a working prototype (with noted tweaks needed) and reflected on its usefulness, meeting the standards for a thorough, applied integration.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "It's basically an investment help app, you know, to determine some key stock metrics and to determine if you should buy."
"So, I kind of already got it started." / "I have to do some tweaking to make sure these work all the time."
"so basically it just gives you a recommendation if you should buy in the timeline and its confidence level"
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover: Student clearly defines the app as an investment help tool (purpose stated).  
Implement: Student reports the app is already started and fetching data (watchlist, tickers) and notes active development/tweaks.  
Reflect: Student comments on usability and data sources (NASDAq headlines, investor relations) and includes a disclaimer about accuracy.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates a functioning financial application: it ingests stock tickers, compiles data/news/metrics, and produces buy/hold recommendations with confidence — meeting the criterion that the tool performs financial tasks. Implementation and reflection remarks confirm the app is built and actively working (with occasional tweaks), so PASS is warranted.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "it pop it gives you an ai generated thesis so is recommended as a buy driven by its robust product cycle its strong services growth and their strategic AI investments."
"it is like a really cool like just summary of like stock it's like really easy to understand it and link for somebody"
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Discover: Student framed the problem and intent ("It's basically an investment help app... to determine if you should buy"), showing motivation for AI use.
- Implement: Student built a working prototype with Google AI Studio and iterated on it ("using Google AI Studio", "I have to do some tweaking to make sure these work all the time").
- Reflect: Student validated usefulness and user-facing value ("...really easy to understand..."), indicating the AI outputs add practical value.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates substantive AI integration: the app uses Google AI Studio to generate buy/sell recommendations, confidence scores, and AI-generated theses/summaries that inform users. The student produced a working prototype (with noted tweaks needed) and reflected on its usefulness, meeting the standards for a thorough, applied integration.
